firstNightReminder: The Technician points at 2 players. Give a finger signal for 1 of their character types. (1 = Townsfolk, 2 = Outsider...)
otherNightReminder: The Technician points at 2 players. Give a finger signal for 1 of their character types. (1 = Townsfolk, 2 = Outsider...)
name: Technician
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn the character type of 1 of them.
flavor: On the job sir!!

firstNightReminder: The Deputy points at a player.
otherNightReminder: The Deputy points at a player.
name: Deputy
ability: Each night, choose a player: their opposing neighbours can't die until dusk.
flavor: Stop. You shall not fight. If one of you starts to even move in a direction or think the thought of fighting, you will face me.

firstNightReminder: The Driller points to a player, and a character on their sheet.
otherNightReminder: The Driller points to a player, and a character on their sheet.
name: Driller
ability: Each night, choose a player & guess their good character: if correct, they die before dusk.
flavor: We are almost though, just a little bit more.

firstNightReminder: The Geologist points at 2 players. Point at the one of them that is good.
otherNightReminder: The Geologist points at 2 players. Point at the one of them that is good.
name: Geologist
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn 1 of them that is good. If both are evil, this info is arbitrary
flavor: This is an amazing earth, the minerals here will yeild well.

otherNightReminder: Show a token marked "Prevented".
name: Metallurgist
ability: Each night*, you learn a character which would've died but didn't since dawn or that none did.
flavor: Nothing passes by my watch, I know the system. It is like fibres building up my being. I am the one who can utelise it the best. Stand below my feet fellow workers.

otherNightReminder: If the Prospector nominated yesterday: show the character token of the player they nominated yesterday.
name: Prospector
ability: Each night*, you learn the character you nominated today. If an evil player died since dawn, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: I've struck gold!!!

name: Lapidary
ability: On your 1st day, you may visit the Storyteller to privately learn the order of character types of some neighbouring players.
flavor: Such beutiful gems. A little amethyst, small pieces of ruby, and one sizable emerald.

otherNightReminder: If one of the players the Demonlitionist chose died tonight, the other dies too.
name: Demolitionist
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose 2 players: if 1 dies, the other does too.

firstNightReminder: The Storeman either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a players. If the Storeman chose a player, show them that players character token.
otherNightReminder: If the Storeman has not yet used their ability: the Storeman either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a players. If the Storeman chose a player, show them that players character token.
name: Storeman
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: you learn & gain their ability. If they are evil, you are poisoned.
flavor: Take a look at what we've got.

otherNightReminder: If the Overman died today or tonight: wake them. For each night in the game, point at a good player.
name: Overman
ability: If you die, tonight, learn a good player per night.
flavor: There is nothing going on with the mine. I am the owner, don't you dare go against my judgement.

name: Surveyor
ability: If one of your alive neighbours would die, another player might die instead.
flavor: Welcome to the new land. This is our place to deplete. Cash is soon come!

name: Spotter
ability: An alive good player can't die. After they would have died, their clockwise alive good neighbour can't die instead.
flavor: You are not allowed to die under my watch!

name: Panner
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 2 players: if both are good, the 1st time each dies, they don't.
flavor: I got rid of the glittering boulder for this? It's so... so useless without a lucky lunch.

name: Conservationist
ability: Once per game, if a player would die, they don't & another might die instead.
flavor: Leave us alone, don't break this down. Our home is on the line.

name: Moonshiner
ability: 1 of the Demon's alive good neighbours is drunk.
flavor: Come take a sip, homemade to heighten our spirits.

otherNightReminder: If an evil player was executed today, they point to a player.
name: Roamer
ability: If an evil player is executed, tonight, they may guess you: if correct, a player dies before dusk.
flavor: Round and round the place we go. Finding friend and many foe.

otherNightReminder: If the Counterfeiter died today or tonight: wake them. For each night in the game, they point at 2 players: if they point at a player marked **Fake**, give the 'yes' head signal and point at them.
name: Counterfeiter
ability: 2 players can't register as their alignment or character to Townsfolk. If you die, tonight, guess them per night: learn correct guesses.
flavor: A part of me for a part of you. Oh, you actually agreed to that? Here have a part of me, an empty part.

firstNightReminder: Point at a good player. The Skinwalker points at a character on their script.
otherNightReminder: The Skinwalker points at a character on their script.
name: Skinwalker
ability: You know a good player. Each night, choose a character & alignment you both register as until you choose again to Townsfolk.
flavor: They said I couldn't become like you. I will prove them wrong. I will become you.

firstNightReminder: The Gargoyle points at a player.
otherNightReminder: The Gargoyle points at a player.
name: Gargoyle
ability: Each night, choose a player: players they nominate tomorrow might die before dusk.
flavor: Nothing misses my watch.

firstNightReminder: If no Outsiders live, the Wraith points at 2 players: mark them poisoned.
otherNightReminder: If no Outsiders live and the Wraith hasn't woken yet, the Wraith points at 2 players: mark them poisoned.
name: Wraith
ability: The 1st night no Outsiders live, choose 2 player: they are poisoned. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
flavor: You will not see the light of day.

name: Vessel
ability: Evil players (not Travellers) who nominate you swap characters with you, unless 3 players live. You can't die.
flavor: You are now stuck with me. Keep me company. This is going to be so fun.

firstNightReminder: 3 times: point to a player and show their character token.
otherNightReminder: 3 times: point to a player and show their character token. The Chorus points to a player. That player dies.
name: Chorus
ability: Each night, you learn 3 players & their characters. Each night*, choose a player: they die.
flavor: A dark song shines through the days and nights.

otherNightReminder: The Wurm points to a player. That player dies.
name: Wurm
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your alive neighbours might die at any time.
flavor: These terrifying creatures burrow beneath the ground, listening for the sounds of footsteps above. The only mercy offered by these creatures is the tell-tale hiss of their approach, thus allowing would-be victims a moment to prepare for the oncoming attack.

otherNightReminder: The Rakshasa points to a player. That player dies.
name: Rakshasa
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You can't die to executions by Townsfolk, except if 3 players live. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: You don't stand a chance against me.

firstNightReminder: Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Palingensi character token.
otherNightReminder: If no alive player know the Palingenisi is in play: wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Palingensi character token. The Palingenesi points to a player. That player dies.
name: Palingensi
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. 1 alive player knows you are in play. If you die, they become an evil Palingenesi. [-1 Minion]
flavor: Entry 5712: The Palingenesi in an entity found in 1662 in a cave, named after its ability to reform upon destruction. Burning, Crushing, Disolving, and Slashing are just a few methods we have tested, none have worked. We are trying all we can. It won't be contained. I will probably die before the end of the month. My death will hopefully contain it for enough time for a way to destroy it to be found. Someone had to be the sacrifice.

firstNightReminder: You may show the Demon the **This Character Selected You** info card then the Forge. If so, the Demon points to a player.
otherNightReminder: You may show the Demon the **This Character Selected You** info card then the Forge. If so, the Demon points to a player.
name: Forge
ability: Each night, the Demon might learn this & have the ability "Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned until dusk." instead of their own until dusk.
flavor: A fate will be smithed together, made from iron and blood.

firstNightReminder: Show a Townsfolk token. Tonight, wake the Greenhorn as the character they learned would.
otherNightReminder: Tonight, wake the Greenhorn as the character they learned would.
name: Greenhorn
ability: On your 1st night, you learn & gain a Townsfolk ability.
flavor: It said welcome on a sign and I didn't like my old job, pefect opportunity for something new!

firstNightReminder: Tonight, wake the Adversary as their ability would.
name: Adversary
ability: You and the other Adversary have the same ability. On your 1st day, you learn a part of it. If one dies, the other does too. [2 opposing Adversaries]
flavor: Is that another challenger? Finally. It's been ages since I've had a good fight.

name: Appraiser
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose 2 players: today, they may only vote if both agree & can`t vote for each other.
flavor: You two look like you would pair perfectly together.

name: Debt Collector
ability: Players may privately make promises to you. Players you catch breaking them: die.
flavor: I welcome you my friend. My friend death.

name: Brawler
ability: You may nominate any number of times & players who have already been nominated. Players you nominate might be drunk until dawn.
flavor: Crush your drink and grab a chair, itâ€™s time for a bar fight!.
